text: Egha a ua ghaze, “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn, God damuasa mɨkemezir biziba, kɨ puram a mɨzuam da bagh gan ikɨtɨ God damuasa amir biziba, a mɨkemezɨ moghɨn dar amuam.” Egha ua ghaze, “Ia gan, kɨ borir God na ganɨngiziba me ko iti.”2:13 Iesusɨn akar kam, a Aisaia 8:17-18ɨn ize. Gumazim o amizir Hibrun Akɨnafarim Osirizim, en akaghtɨ e fogham, Iesus gumazamizir igharaziba ko magh gari, me an aveghbuaba ko an boriba. Ezɨ gumazamiziba God mɨzuaima a bizibagh ami, ezɨ Iesus uaghan orarti.
